Flow.description: Process on the Case object to automatically populate Account associated with the Contact; Account associated with ERP; Account Associated with Merchant; Account and Merchant associated with Terminal; STCP1-1260

value.stringValue:
OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), NOT (ISBLANK([Case].Merchant__c )), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_CCS'
),
AND (
ISCHANGED ([Case].Merchant__c ), NOT (ISBLANK( [Case].Merchant__c )), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_CCS' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_11
formulas.expression:
OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), NOT (ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Merchant__c} )), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Support_CCS'
),
AND (
ISCHANGED ({!myVariable_current.Merchant__c} ), NOT (ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Merchant__c} )), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Support_CCS' ) )

value.stringValue:

),
AND (
ISCHANGED ([Case].ERP__c ), NOT (ISBLANK([Case].ERP__c )), [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_CCS' ) )

formulas.expression:

),

formulas.expression:
OR ( AND ( ISNEW(), NOT (ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Terminal__c} )), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'Support_CCS'

Flow.label: Update fields on Case based on related records
